page.title: 16Playground Games in Sheldon
page.content: IMAGINATIVE GAMES-Mums & Dads, Schools When we play mums&dads most people like to be a baby but I like to be a big girl because I can pretend to put high white shoes on & make-up.I also have a handbag. Schools:-First we pretend to do some work, then we go out to play. OLD FAVOURITES-Tig,Skipping,Running,P.E In Tig someone is on and if they tig you, you stand with your arms stretched out like a scarecrow.You are free when girls run under your outstretched arms. I skip with my friends.Skipping skipping,I like skipping is one song we skip to.Running is a nice game.I some- times win & sometimes lose & sometimes a draw.When we are allowed on the grass I do handstands and cartwheels.It is PE GAMES DRAWN ON THE PLAYGROUND-Hopscotch I love playing hopscotch because I like hopping and jumping on the squares.
